Plot: Ode to Uke by Arthur Ravenscrag III, Paul Andrews (Illustrator). Ode to Uke is love story like no other. A clever and humorous dedication to the ukulele, you’ll laugh as you strum along. Including illustrations, songs to learn - Ode to Uke takes a look at the ukulele in a way you’ve never seen it before. Chapters devoted to metal, country, old Hollywood, Hawaii and the heroes of the ukulele, this little instrument will steal your heart. It doesn’t matter if you’re an expert or you’ve just been given your first ukulele, Ode to Uke is for everyone.
